title: News: List of articles should be accurate and readable
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu item
custom_steps: When we scroll through the news articles
custom_expected: Then the news articles will be accurate & readable

title: News: Scrolling through the List of Articles initially will display the WorldBaseballClassic.com placeholder icon while the images load
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu item
And we haven't scrolled through the articles yet
custom_steps: When we scroll through the articles
custom_expected: Then we will briefly see the WorldBaseballClassic.com placeholder icon while the appropriate images load

title: News: Verify we can traverse through news articles and that the thumbnails and formatting look correct
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu item
custom_steps: When we navigate through the News articles
custom_expected:
Then all the news articles that we have traversed through look formatted correctly
And have their thumbnails load appropriately

title: News: By default the main news page will display 20 articles if they are available
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu item
custom_expected: Then the main news page will display up to 20 articles if they are available

title: News: Tapping on a News Article loads that particular article
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu item
custom_steps: When we tap on a news article
custom_expected: Then that news article loads successfully

title: News: When inside an article tapping the Up or Down arrows will allow you to move between news articles
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu item
And we have tapped on a news article
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Up arrow
Or we tap the Down arrow
custom_expected: Then it will allow us to navigate between news articles

title: News (Sharing): Verify if we open up a news article on a device iOS 5 and greater that there is a Twitter button available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic on a device with an iOS version 5.0+
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
custom_expected:
THEN the ShareBar will be visible
AND we will see a Twitter Button
AND we will see a Email Button

title: News (Sharing): Verify that we can see the following buttons on iOS 5 and greater: twitter, facebook & email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic on a device 5.0+
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
custom_expected:
THEN the ShareBar will be visible
AND the twitter button will be visible
AND the email button will be visible

title: News (Sharing): Verify if we tap inside the news article that the ShareBar disappears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap inside of the News Article
custom_expected: THEN the ShareBar will disappear

title: News (Sharing): Verify if we tap inside the news article after dismissing the ShareBar that it brings the ShareBar back again
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap inside the News Article to make the ShareBar disappear
AND we tap inside the News Article again
custom_expected: THEN the ShareBar will be visible

title: News (Sharing): Verify if the ShareBar is visible and we begin to scroll that the ShareBar disappears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND the ShareBar is currently visible
AND we scroll down the News Article
custom_expected: THEN the ShareBar will disappear

title: News (Sharing): Verify that when the user reaches the bottom of a news article that the ShareBar reappears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on a News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we scroll to the bottom of the Article
custom_expected: THEN the ShareBar will become visible once again

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article that it brings up a Tweet screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
custom_expected:
THEN a Tweet screen will appear
AND the Tweet screen will contain a Cancel button
AND the Tweet screen will contain a Send button

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article that we can cancel out of the subsequent Tweet screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
AND we tap on the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN the Tweet screen will successfully close.

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article while not having a Twitter account set that we get prompted to go to iOS settings to enter an account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we do NOT have a Twitter account setup on our device
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
custom_expected: THEN we will be prompted to go to our iOS settings to enter a Twitter Account

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article while having multiple Twitter accounts setup that we will see a "From:" field that lets us switch between Twitter Accounts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed 
AND we have multiple Twitter Accounts setup on the device
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that a "From:" field exists
AND we will see that we can switch between Twitter accounts when tapping on it

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Send button on a Tweet that it successfully posts the Tweet to Twitter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
AND we tap on the Send button
custom_expected: THEN the Tweet will successfully post to Twitter

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we have posted a Tweet to Twitter that we see the following at the end of the Tweet: "(via WorldBaseballClassic.com World Baseball Classic) <enterUrl>"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the twitter button
AND we tap on the Send button
AND we check Twitter
custom_expected: THEN we see that the end of the Tweet contains: "(via WorldBaseballClassic.com World Baseball Classic) <enterUrl>"

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that if we tap the Email button on a news article that it brings up the iOS default mail view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the Email button
custom_expected: THEN the iOS default mail view will open

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that if we tap the Email button on a news article while having no Email account setup that we will be prompted with a message to set the account up in the devices Mail settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we currently do not have an Email Account setup
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the Email button
custom_expected: THEN we will be prompted with a message of setting up our email account in Email Settings.

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that we can successfully send an email through the email flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the Email button
AND we send an Email
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the Email successfully send
AND the recipient will successfully receive the Email

title: News: Ensure that one large article and two small articles appear on the first page of the News section
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu
custom_expected:
Then there will be one large article on the left
And there will be two small articles on the right

title: News: Tapping on the bottom banner on the main News page brings you to the expected page
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu
custom_steps: When we tap the bottom banner on the main page
custom_expected: Then the expected page for that banner will open

title: News: Tapping on a News Article opens that article in a new screen
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu
custom_steps: When we have tapped a news article
custom_expected: Then that news article will open up in a new screen

title: News: If there is more then one page to an article we are then able to swipe to the right to see the rest of it
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News article that has more then one page
custom_expected: Then we can swipe between the various pages of that particular article

title: News: Verify the page indicator dots at the bottom of the article are valid as the article is swiped through
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News article
custom_steps: When we swipe through the article
custom_expected: Then the page indicator dots at the bottom update & reflect correctly

title: News: When clicking on a Video in a News Article the Video will then play successfully
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News Article with a Video in it
custom_steps: When we tap on the Video in the News Article
custom_expected: Then the Video play successfully

title: News: Tapping the Next Article button when a News Article is open will allow the next article to be shown
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News Article
custom_steps: When we tap on the Next Article button
custom_expected: Then the next article successfully loads up

title: News: Tapping the Increase or Decrease font size buttons allows the News Article in question to have it's font increase or decrease in size appropriately
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News Article
And we have tapped on the double A in the top right corner
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Increase font size button
Or we tap on the Decrease font size button
custom_expected: Then the font of the news article updates appropriately

title: News: When a News Article has more then one page the second page will always contain a full page ad
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have selected a News Article with more then one page
custom_steps: When we navigate to the second page of the News Article
custom_expected: Then a full page ad will be visible

title: News: When we tap on the Teams button in the top of the page, we are able to select a team and only see news relevant to that particular team
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the News menu
And we have tapped the Teams button in the top of the page
And we have selected a Team
custom_steps: When we load the News for all 30 teams
custom_expected: Then the news being displayed will be loaded for all teams

title: News: When swiping through the News Articles on the main page the banner at the bottom doesn't move
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the News menu
custom_steps: When we swipe through the news articles
custom_expected: Then the bottom banner remains where it is without moving

title: News: Verify News Articles with team.com that are shared through an email are able to be opened
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the News menu
AND we select a News Article
AND we tap on the Sharing Arrow in the top right corner
AND we select 'Send Article through E-Mail'
AND we open the article on a Local Machine
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to successfully open up the news article that was shared via e-mail

title: News (Sharing): Verify if we open up a news article on a device iOS 5+ and we click the button in the top right corner that there is a Tweet option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic on a device of iOS 5.0+
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com button
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap the button in the top right corner
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a 'Tweet' button
AND we will see a 'Mail a Link' button

title: News (Sharing): Verify if we open up a news article on a device iOS 5+ and we click the button in the top right corner that the options are the following: Tweet, Email a Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the option of 'Tweet'
AND we will see the option of 'Email a Link'

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article that it brings up a Tweet screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the Tweet button
custom_expected: THEN a 'Tweet' screen will appear for the user

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article that we can cancel out of the subsequent Tweet screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the Tweet button
AND we tap Cancel in the Tweet screen
custom_expected:
THEN we can successfully cancel out of the Tweet
AND we are brought back to our previous location inside the application

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Twitter button on a news article while having multiple Twitter accounts setup that we will see a "From:" field that lets us switch between Twitter Accounts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have multiple Twitter accounts setup
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the Tweet button
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that a "From:" field exists
AND we will see that we can switch between Twitter accounts when tapping on it

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we tap the Send button on a Tweet that it successfully posts the Tweet to Twitter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the Tweet button
AND we tap on the Send button
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Tweet successfully posted to Twitter

title: News (Sharing - Twitter): Verify that if we have posted a Tweet to Twitter that we see the following at the end of the Tweet: "Sent with http://WorldBaseballClassic.com World Baseball Classic<enterUrl>"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on the News Article
AND we have tapped on the button in the top right
AND we have tapped on the Tweet button
AND we have tapped on Send
custom_expected: THEN we will see on Twitter that the end of the Tweet contains the following message: "Sent with http://WorldBaseballClassic.com World Baseball Classic <enterUrl>"

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that if we tap the Email button on a news article that it brings up the iOS default mail view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the 'Mail a Link' button
custom_expected: THEN the default iOS mail view will appear successfully

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that if we tap the Email button on a news article while having no Email account setup that we will be prompted with a message to set the account up in the devices Mail Settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we don't have an Email Account setup on the device
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the 'Mail a Link' button
custom_expected: THEN we will be prompted with a message to set the account up in Mail Settings

title: News (Sharing - Email): Verify that we can successfully send an email through the email flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu
AND we tap on the News button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner
AND we tap on the 'Mail a Link' button
AND we send an email through the flow
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to successfully send an email
AND the recipient is able to successfully receive the email
